overall_assessment.summary: This lesson poses significant challenges for Marcus. Major revisions needed to ensure accessibility.
overall_assessment.primary_concern: All tasks at or below grade level with no advanced options

concerns.issue: All tasks at or below grade level with no advanced options
concerns.impact: Marcus will master content in minutes and have nothing appropriate to do
concerns.evidence: Grade 10 lesson with no above-level paths or advanced tasks

recommendation.change: Add above-grade-level options or open-ended advanced challenges
recommendation.rationale: Gifted students (3+ years ahead) need qualitatively different work
recommendation.implementation: Include tasks requiring synthesis, creation, or application to complex scenarios

concerns.issue: Limited pacing flexibility for students who master content quickly
concerns.impact: Marcus may finish early and wait; no option to move to advanced content
concerns.evidence: No explicit curriculum compacting or acceleration options

recommendation.change: Build in flexible pacing for students who demonstrate early mastery
recommendation.rationale: Respecting gifted students' time shows they are valued
recommendation.implementation: Create "early finisher" pathway to substantively different work

concerns.issue: Limited abstract or theoretical content for advanced reasoners
concerns.evidence: Lesson stays close to concrete examples without theoretical extension

recommendation.change: Add "big picture" or theoretical extension for interested students
recommendation.rationale: Abstract thinkers benefit from seeing underlying patterns and principles
recommendation.implementation: Include optional theoretical framework or "what's the general principle?" discussion

concerns.issue: Majority of work is repetitive practice - meaningless for students who've mastered content
concerns.impact: Marcus already understands this; repetition is punishment, not learning
concerns.evidence: 3 of 3 activities are drill/practice: ['Students copy definitions from the board', 'Students quiz each other on definitions', 'Practice quiz matching terms to definitions']

recommendation.change: Replace repetitive practice with substantive intellectual work for mastery students
recommendation.rationale: Different work (not more work) - gifted students need challenge, not repetition
recommendation.implementation: Offer application to complex scenario, creation task, or analysis instead of drill
